languages.text: "Теплый прием соплеменников". {n}Маражай презрительно кривится.{/n} "Но я чувствую их страх. Это хороший призна..."

traits.locale_text: "Теплый прием соплеменников". {n}Маражай презрительно кривится.{/n} "Но я чувствую их страх. Это хороший призна..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "The warm welcome of my kin." {n}Marazhai's mouth twists in contempt.{/n} "But I can feel their fear. It is a good si—"

languages.text: "Die herzliche Begrüßung meiner Verwandtschaft." {n}Marazhais Mund verzieht sich angewidert.{/n} "Doch ich kann ihre Angst spüren. Es ist ein gutes Zei-"
languages.original_text: "The warm welcome of my kin." {n}Marazhai's mouth twists in contempt.{/n} "But I can feel their fear. It is a good si—"

traits.locale_text: "Die herzliche Begrüßung meiner Verwandtschaft." {n}Marazhais Mund verzieht sich angewidert.{/n} "Doch ich kann ihre Angst spüren. Es ist ein gutes Zei-"

languages.text: “我的族人在热烈欢迎我们。”{n}玛拉斋轻蔑地扭起嘴角。{/n}“不过，我能感觉到他们的恐惧。这是个好——”
languages.original_text: "The warm welcome of my kin." {n}Marazhai's mouth twists in contempt.{/n} "But I can feel their fear. It is a good si—"

traits.locale_text: “我的族人在热烈欢迎我们。”{n}玛拉斋轻蔑地扭起嘴角。{/n}“不过，我能感觉到他们的恐惧。这是个好——”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « L'accueil chaleureux des miens, {n}grimace Marazhai avec un sourire amer.{/n} Mais je peux sentir leur peur. C'est un bon si... »
languages.original_text: "The warm welcome of my kin." {n}Marazhai's mouth twists in contempt.{/n} "But I can feel their fear. It is a good si—"

traits.locale_text: « L'accueil chaleureux des miens, {n}grimace Marazhai avec un sourire amer.{/n} Mais je peux sentir leur peur. C'est un bon si... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Ah, la cálida bienvenida de mi gente». {n}La boca de Marazhai forma una mueca de desprecio.{/n} «Pero puedo sentir su miedo. Es buena se...».
languages.original_text: "The warm welcome of my kin." {n}Marazhai's mouth twists in contempt.{/n} "But I can feel their fear. It is a good si—"

traits.locale_text: «Ah, la cálida bienvenida de mi gente». {n}La boca de Marazhai forma una mueca de desprecio.{/n} «Pero puedo sentir su miedo. Es buena se...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「同族の暖かい歓迎を」{n}マラズハイの口がさげすむように歪む。{/n}「だが、奴らの恐怖が感じられる。これはいい…」
languages.original_text: "The warm welcome of my kin." {n}Marazhai's mouth twists in contempt.{/n} "But I can feel their fear. It is a good si—"

traits.locale_text: 「同族の暖かい歓迎を」{n}マラズハイの口がさげすむように歪む。{/n}「だが、奴らの恐怖が感じられる。これはいい…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Türümün misafirperverliği." {n}Marazhai'ın dudakları kibirle kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Ancak korkularını hissedebiliyorum. Bu iyiye iş..."
languages.original_text: "The warm welcome of my kin." {n}Marazhai's mouth twists in contempt.{/n} "But I can feel their fear. It is a good si—"

traits.locale_text: "Türümün misafirperverliği." {n}Marazhai'ın dudakları kibirle kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Ama ben onların korkusunu hissedebiliyorum. Bu iyiye iş..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
